title: [P22] Random acts of salesmanship
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144908/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 12.Jun.2006 7.59am 

A sale:  
Perhaps not so random - we will be moving in a few months and storage is already at capacity here, so here are a few things we thought you might be interested in...

For one week only, June 12-19, a few sales... at somewhat insane prices.

-Indie Fonts 2 book only $10 plus shipping  
 [http://www.p22.com/indiefonts/indie2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144908/http:/www.p22.com/indiefonts/indie2.html)  
We have more of this second volume than we thought, so thatâ€™s good for you. Makes a great gift!

-Futurismo Soundtrack with Dada font - only $5 plus shipping  
 [http://www.p22.com/records/futurismo.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144908/http:/www.p22.com/records/futurismo.html)  
Our groundbreaking, first ever soundtrack to a font.  
(no download at this price)

-Download LTC Caslon Bold Long Italic font for only $5  
 [http://www.p22.com/Lanston/products/caslon.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144908/http:/www.p22.com/Lanston/products/caslon.html)  
A nice font on its own, but perhaps if you like this one, you can always get the rest.

Sale ends June 19 at Midnight Eastern Standard Time

Best Wishes  
P22 Inventory Reduction Division
author: paul d hunt
